items.sentence: I jumped out of bed and ran outside, forgetting I was naked.
If you and I could join forces, we'd really get things done.
I'm trying to figure out how to solve the problem by myself.
People like me don't usually get along with people like you.
Rumor has it that Tom and Mary are going to be married soon.
Tom's success has been a source of great pride to all of us.
Tom got angry when Mary referred to his friend in that tone.
If I'd known Tom's address, I would've written him a letter.
Tom didn't want to go outside without his hat and gloves on.
Tom doesn't want to marry Mary, but his parents want him to.
